hero.label: Strategic Mentoring

services.label: Our Method
services.title: Three Pillars. One Strategy.
services.subtitle: Mathematics and physics are the fuel. Testing is the weapon. Admission is the destination.

private.title: STEM Excellence
private.desc: Advanced mentoring in mathematics and physics. Foundations for EPFL, Polytechnique, ETH Zurich and the Ivy League. Scientific rigor as the bedrock of every elite application.

sat.title: SAT & Competitive Testing
sat.desc: Average SAT score of 1520. An engineer's method for the SAT, ACT and competitive entry exams (Polytechnique Bachelor, prepas). Goal: the 75th percentile of target institutions.

admissions.title: Admission Strategy
admissions.desc: International applications, narrative strategy, interview coaching. Multi-zone strategy: Ivy League & Top US, Oxbridge & UK, Polytechnique & Prepas, EPFL & ETH Zurich.

method.label: Methodology
method.title: A clear method, proven results
method.subtitle: Three pillars for a path to excellence

step1.title: Assessment & Strategy
step1.desc: Complete evaluation of academic level and ambitions. Personalized progress plan with a clear vision of the end goal: the target school or university.

step2.title: Academic Excellence
step2.desc: Deep mastery of mathematics and physics. No cramming: I develop logic, analysis and problem-solving skills for lasting results.

step3.title: Ongoing Support
step3.desc: Monthly parent reports, continuous coaching, application support, and guidance all the way to enrollment at the target institution.

results.subtitle: Where my students have been admitted: grandes ecoles, elite prepas and top global universities

testimonials.video_austin: Austin - Experience with GM Strategic Mentoring

review_sarah.quote: Greg has been tutoring Max since 9th grade. After struggling at EJM, his grades skyrocketed in just 2 months. Beyond results, his holistic support helped Max gain maturity.
review_sarah.name: Sarah K.

review_marie.quote: Very clear explanations and a truly wonderful teacher. Recommended by my cousin and truly perfect.

review_thomas.quote: 780 on the SAT math section and an excellent application. As Greg says, hard work always pays off. Thank you again.
review_thomas.name: Thomas B.

about_preview.label: About
about_preview.title: Greg Mittelette
about_preview.quote_translation: We don't learn for school, but for life.
about_preview.text: How do we prepare our children in a rapidly changing world where school, despite its merits, is no longer enough? This is the dilemma I share with every parent. Graduate of Paris-Saclay, Centrale Lyon and UPenn, I have dedicated my career to answering it. Over 1,600 students guided to the world's top schools and universities.

q1.question: What type of support do you offer?
q1.answer: My approach is comprehensive: math and physics excellence, exam preparation (SAT, IB, BFI), admissions strategy for top global schools and universities, and career coaching to prepare for the future.

q2.question: When is the ideal time to start strategic mentoring?
q2.answer: Ideally from 6th-7th grade to build STEM foundations and strategically prepare entry into elite tracks (Jeannine Manuel, EABJM, international sections). My mentoring continues through post-secondary admissions to the world's most selective institutions.

q3.question: How do you support admissions?
q3.answer: I work on the complete application: school selection strategy, academic profile strengthening, personal statement preparation, and interview training. 80% of my students are admitted to a top 30 university or grande ecole.

q4.question: Do you offer online sessions?
q4.answer: Yes, I use professional interactive tools that make online sessions as effective as in-person ones. Ideal for AEFE families and expats worldwide.

q5.question: Do you work with international school students?
q5.answer: Absolutely. I mentor many students in IB, BFI and the AEFE network. My international experience (UPenn) gives me a thorough understanding of these curricula and what top English-speaking universities expect.

contact.label: Contact
contact.title: Ready to aim for excellence?
contact.text: Fill out this form to discuss your child's goals and find the best strategy together.
contact.message_placeholder: Describe the student's journey, ambitions, target institutions...
contact.info_text: I personally respond to every inquiry within 24 hours. Share your child's ambitions and target schools so I can suggest the best strategy.

footer.desc: Elite strategic mentoring: STEM, SAT, global admissions. Ivy League, Polytechnique, Oxbridge, EPFL. Guidance for ambitious families.
footer.copyright: © 2025 GM Strategic Mentoring. All rights reserved.

thank_you.title: Thank you!
thank_you.text: Your message has been sent. I will get back to you within 24 hours.

private.title: STEM Foundations & Elite Track
private.subtitle: The Continuum of Excellence: from STEM foundations to the gates of the Ivy League

audience1.title: Early STEM Foundations
audience1.desc: Starting from 6th grade, we lay the mathematical and scientific foundations that will make your child unbeatable by senior year. The expert who knows the end of the story – Stanford, MIT – is the only one who can write its first chapter.

audience2.title: Pre-Elite Track
audience2.desc: Strategic preparation for entry into elite tracks: Jeannine Manuel, EABJM, international sections, BFI. Methodical construction of the academic profile required by the most selective institutions.

audience3.title: Competitive Entry & Beyond
audience3.desc: Competitive exam preparation, mentoring through scientific preparatory classes, guidance toward top engineering schools and global universities. From prepa to the Ivy League.

private.lignee_title: We know how the story ends
private.lignee_text: The expert who knows the final destination – Stanford, MIT, the Ivy League – is the only one who can write the first chapter. Starting from 6th grade, we don't sell fractions: we architect a mind to be unbeatable by senior year, and a profile to be irresistible at 18.
private.lignee_credo: If you're looking for someone to correct an exercise, you're not in the right place. If you're looking to secure a path to the elite, contact GM Strategic Mentoring.
private.continuum_subtitle: From Junior Excellence to Ivy League: we build the STEM foundations and the strategic profile required for the world's most competitive institutions.

format1.title: In-Person - Paris
format1.desc: In-person sessions in a dedicated space. Direct interaction for optimal mentoring.

format2.title: Online - International
format2.desc: Video conference sessions with interactive tools. Ideal for expat families and the AEFE network worldwide.

sat.title: SAT Preparation
sat.subtitle: The strategic weapon for America's top universities
sat.method_text: A structured 3-phase program: initial diagnostic, intensive section-by-section training, and timed simulations. Each session targets identified weak points to maximize the final score.

about.title: About Greg
about.subtitle: "Non scholae, sed vitae discimus" – Seneca
about.bio_text1: Every parent today shares this fundamental dilemma: how do we prepare our children in a rapidly changing world where school, despite its merits, is no longer enough?
about.bio_text2: In an era redefined by artificial intelligence and innovation, mathematics and physics are no longer just school subjects. They forge a logical, rigorous and creative mind that enables your children to master tomorrow's technologies, solve complex challenges and adapt to an unpredictable future.
about.bio_text3: With my experience guiding over 1,600 students, I have dedicated my career to answering this dilemma. My approach goes beyond conventional education: I work with each family to build a comprehensive strategy, from academic mastery to admission into the world's most selective schools and universities.
about.philosophy_text: Academic excellence, strategic vision and future readiness. I don't just improve grades: I guide each student to develop the skills, the profile and the confidence needed to gain admission to the world's top institutions and thrive there.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Discover feedback from our students and their parents

admissions.label: Admissions Consulting
admissions.title: From academic excellence to the gates of the world's elite institutions
admissions.subtitle: Multi-zone strategy: Ivy League, Oxbridge, Polytechnique, EPFL, elite prepas
admissions.intro_text: Getting into Stanford, Oxford or Polytechnique demands far more than perfect grades. I transform your potential into a singular, memorable application through a proven narrative and scientific strategy, adapted to each admission system.

item1.title: Profile Audit
item1.desc: Complete evaluation of academic background: transcripts, class rank, strengths and areas for improvement.

item2.title: Curriculum Building
item2.desc: Strategic advice on advanced course selection (AP, IB, Honors) to maximize perceived academic rigor.

item3.title: "Spike" Development
item3.desc: Identifying a unique academic niche or passion to stand out among thousands of "perfect" candidates.

item1.title: Expert Math / Physics Mentoring
item1.desc: Intensive preparation to guarantee the top grades required for elite applications.

item2.title: Standardized Test Preparation
item2.desc: SAT / ACT strategies and coaching to reach the 75th percentile of target universities.

item1.title: Personal Statement
item1.desc: Brainstorming and crafting an authentic, powerful narrative that reveals your personality.

item2.title: Supplemental Essays
item2.desc: Fine-tuning your voice to meet the specific expectations of each institution (Stanford, Yale, Harvard, etc.).

item3.title: Activities Optimization
item3.desc: Strategic showcasing of your extracurricular involvement and proof of leadership.

item1.title: Intensive Mock Interviews
item1.desc: Practice with evaluation rubrics modeled on those used by admissions officers.

item2.title: Oral Storytelling
item2.desc: Turn every answer into an opportunity to demonstrate your "intellectual vitality".

item1.title: University List Selection
item1.desc: Strategic balancing of "Reach", "Match" and "Safety schools" to maximize your chances.

item2.title: Letters of Recommendation
item2.desc: Coaching to identify and guide teachers who can write outstanding support letters.

item3.title: 100% Digital Support
item3.desc: Maximum responsiveness through video format, adapted to international students and demanding schedules.
